title: Bug 49536 - Accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404 when no webapps are deployed
description: When a Tomcat 7 instance is started with no webapps deployed and a URL is accessed, it returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of returning an HTTP error 404.
OB: When accessing a URL in a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: The expected behavior is to return an HTTP error 404 when a URL is accessed in a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
2. Access a URL in the Tomcat instance.
3. Verify that the response contains an HTTP error 404 instead of an HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
